On the way back to the Ark.

Tucson knew time was crutial and he knew that =
even though he was not in the best of condition, he still felt that he had =
to contribute to making an effort to save the Ark.  

"Windlord, Kup, your =
words are wise, and if situations were different, I would definitely heed t=
hem very well.  But situations are grim, and without my help, we could lose=
 everything we stand for. I am not about to let that happen a second time, =
my friends.  I promised to protect the Ark when I took the power of the Mat=
rix.  And protect it and everyone I will. It's important that the Autobots =
who are in stasis now, are preserved until it's their time to awaken.  Espe=
cially, Optimus Prime.  We can not let anything happen to him, and at the s=
ame time, I can not let anything happen to all of you."

He forces himself =
to accelerate yet it proves difficult, in his present condition.

Inside th=
e Ark.

While watching Quickstride, Uproar catches a curious scent in the A=
rk.  He finds it to be feline, and familliar.  He can also smell the scent =
of the intruder.  He narrows his eyes.

"Guys, I think I'm picking up on El=
ita's scent, it's faint, but it's there, and there's another scent I'm not =
familliar with...  Definitely not one of us that's for sure.."  I - think E=
lita's in danger."

Quickstride looks down to him.

"Well, that's not at al=
l impossible because I'm getting a blip on my wrist radar..  Yeah, you're r=
ight, there is an intruder here, and two blips, one familliar, Maximal like=
 us, and one that's reading unfamilliar, could be pred or con, or even Mini=
on... Hard ta tell.."

Uproar growls.

If that intruder puts one scratch on=
 Elita....   Leo ll, please, ya gotta lemme go!  I think I know where Elita=
 is and I definitely know there's a dangerous intruder not far from her!  I=
 just dunno who or what it is."

Pacing in a very tense circle, he waits to=
 get permission to follow the scent and the signal.

ks his knuckles.

ol box, and gently opens the door, via a manual

 boy..  Okaaay, well, here's what I think guys..  The wiring appears to 
> =
have been altered somewhat, which means whoever our intruder is, is rather =

rd 
> Tucson talking about trying to disrupt this with a sonar wave, and 
>=
 truthfully, I think it's our best shot. After that, I can get to the bomb =

> and stop it from going off."
> 
> Uproar nodds.
> 
> Well, there ya have=
 it Leo ll.  It's up ta the boss ta step in first.  I 
> hope he's close."

> Outside the Ark, Tucson now finds himself within range to execute the =
sonar 
> disruption plan.  He begins to transmit while enroute.
> 
> "All r=
ight, Tucson to Rodimus, and Legacy.  I am within range and 
> transmitting=
 now.  You should begin to see a disruption in the Ark's systems 
> in the =
form of static and audio interference.  Once you see that, it's time

move in and quickly regain control of the mainframe.   This should also 
> =
bring our enemy out of hiding, once realizing what is happening. It will be=

> 
> Rat Trap senses the=
 wave.
> 
> "Owww, Wheels, is it supposed ta hurt our ears?"
> 
> Tucson si=
ghs.
> 
> I'm sorry Rat Trap, I know, I did not have time to configure a sa=
ftey buffer 
> for the transmission.  I appologize for any pain any of you =
feel, and now 
> suggest that all of you turn off your audio sensors now.  =
That goes for you 
> as well, Rodimus, Legacy, everyone.  This transmission=
 is going to cause 
> more than just a mild disruption, it may also cause y=
ou moderate to severe 
> discomfort.
> 
> The sonar wave gains in strength,=
 as Rat Trap does as told.  The ground 
> beneath them begins to vibrate wi=
th the transmission yet, Tucson seems to 
> continue driving over it at a s=
teady speed.
> 
> Night Shift steadies himself on the shakey ground beneath=
 his tires.
> 
> "Woahh, that's some heavy sonar you're puttn' out big guy.=
.  Let's hope this 
> works."
> 
> Tucson knew he would have to amplify the=
 wave.  He now activates his built 
> in amplifiers to do so.
> 
> " Get re=
ady, I'm amplifying the transmission."
> 
> Upon doing that, the ground vib=
rates just a tad more.  Pebbles dance in all 
> directions as Tucson comes =
closer and closer to the Ark.
